archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.3.2a: a) business drivers for their operation, which may include managing key risks to the business, reducing costs associated with security incidents, protecting the organisation's brand and reputation, maintaining business operations during a security incident and complying with legal, regulatory or contractual requirements
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
